TITLE: Querying Next.js, React Query, and NextAuth with Context7
DESCRIPTION: Examples of how to use Context7 in Cursor to get up-to-date information about various libraries and frameworks.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wilsonsilva/context7-mcp/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: txt
CODE:
```
How do I use the new Next.js `after` function? use context7
```

LANGUAGE: txt
CODE:
```
How do I invalidate a query in React Query? use context7
```

LANGUAGE: txt
CODE:
```
How do I protect a route with NextAuth? use context7
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting up Context7 MCP Development Environment
DESCRIPTION: Commands for cloning the project, installing dependencies, and building the project using Bun.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wilsonsilva/context7-mcp/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bun i
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
bun run build
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Local Context7 MCP Development
DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration for setting up a local development environment for Context7 MCP.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wilsonsilva/context7-mcp/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "context7": {
      "command": "npx",
      "args": ["tsx", "/path/to/folder/context7-mcp/src/index.ts"]
    }
  }
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Testing Context7 MCP with MCP Inspector
DESCRIPTION: Command to test Context7 MCP using the MCP Inspector tool.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wilsonsilva/context7-mcp/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npx -y @modelcontextprotocol/inspector npx @upstash/context7-mcp@latest
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Context7 MCP in Cursor
DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration for adding Context7 as a global MCP server in Cursor's settings.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wilsonsilva/context7-mcp/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "context7": {
      "command": "npx",
      "args": ["-y", "@upstash/context7-mcp@latest"]
    }
  }
}
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Context7 MCP in VSCode
DESCRIPTION: JSON configuration for adding Context7 to VSCode's MCP config file.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wilsonsilva/context7-mcp/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: json
CODE:
```
{
  "servers": {
    "Context7": {
      "type": "stdio",
      "command": "npx",
      "args": ["-y", "@upstash/context7-mcp@latest"]
    }
  }
}
```

TITLE: Installing Context7 MCP in Claude Code
DESCRIPTION: Command to add Context7 MCP to Claude Code using the claude CLI.
SOURCE: https://github.com/wilsonsilva/context7-mcp/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-20_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: sh
CODE:
```
claude mcp add context7 -- npx -y @upstash/context7-mcp@latest
```
